name: Matt Imnottellingyou
text: Ordered online with a 15-minute ASAP wait time. Walked in exactly 15 minutes later and I was greeted, my order was swiftly handed to me, and I was in-and-out in less than 30 seconds. Awesome experience, and the food was prepared accurately and tasted good. Tip: sign up for their emails and regularly receive great discounts.

name: KT Miller
text: This pizza hut is awesome! Great food and always great customer service and quick delivery from their main night driver, Jess. This girl needs a raise if you ask me! Quick delivery and personable delivery driver.
